original_title: Dick Van Dyke and the Other Woman
overview: An enchanting variety special which reunites Dick Van Dyke and Mary Tyler Moore in song and dance. Numbers include "On The Other Hand", "Life Is Like A Situation Comedy", "Food Medley", "Do You Love Me?". Moore's participation in this special led directly to her being offered her own series by the network . This was the beloved "The Mary Tyler Moore Show".
tagline: Dick loves Mary and Mary loves Dick....
title: Dick Van Dyke and the Other Woman
